duties_responsibilities.duty: Research for leads using look-a-like profiles from existing book of business
Vet new leads, schedule calls, manage calendars for assigned AE
Ensure AE’s are abreast of daily client meetings with short briefs and callouts
Help organize Salesforce to ensure all contact info is up-to-date on platform
Create calendar of key client event dates, past order timeline, repeat opportunities to help inform strategic outreach and Marketing
Track industry news and provide strategic reporting
Ensure salesperson is following all processes as outlined in the Corporate Directory
Manage all Salesforce data entry once invoice has been paid
Responsible for timely delivery of client deliverables such as logos, copy, and addresses
Act as point of contact for Production Team on all ongoing orders, raising any red flags with AE on inventory, deadlines, etc.
Review, reformat, and flag issues with client address spreadsheets before handing to Production
